name: Cyberbug
description:
Cyberbug is a shooter where you have to survive the bug apocalypse by defeating them in upcoming waves.  To be able to do that we prepared for you some guns, ammunition and perks!

Hello everyone, my name is Lucas and in the past 3 weeks me and my friend were working on a submission project for the game jam. It was our first time participating, and releasing a game so we learned much and have a lot fun too, if you ended up here somehow :D Give it a try! Play our game, rate and leave a comment, we will really appreciate feedback so tell us what do you think about it!
